Articles.Content:
Salutations.

What is the easiest, code-free way to install a plugin on Mac?

I really wish it was as simple as parts...

It is as simple as parts. Copy the .dll file for the plugin into the plugin folder in KSP. Copy the part that uses the plugin into the parts folder. The .cs file(s) distributed with plugins are the source code, you don\'t need to download it.
